Package com.aoopproject.common.input

package com.aoopproject.common.input
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ConsoleInputStrategy
    An InputStrategy that reads user input from the console.
    KeyboardInputStrategy
    An InputStrategy that captures keyboard arrow key presses for movement.
    MouseInputStrategy
    An InputStrategy that captures mouse clicks on a SameGameViewSwing.GamePanel.
